master.title: Setup Project Structure
master.description: Create the directory structure for the project to keep the code organized.

master.title: Implement WRITE Pillar (Memory)
master.description: Create a module to manage and retrieve user profile data for Sarah. This will include her role and preferred tone.

master.title: Implement SELECT Pillar (RAG)
master.description: Create a module to retrieve relevant documents ('Q3 Sales Performance' PDF and 'Project Phoenix Q3 Retro' notes) from a mock knowledge base.

master.title: Implement COMPRESS Pillar
master.description: Create a module to summarize the content of the retrieved documents into key bullet points.

master.title: Implement ISOLATE Pillar
master.description: Create a module to manage the agent's tools, with a function to isolate and provide only the 'get_direct_reports_feedback()' tool schema.

master.title: Assemble Final Prompt
master.description: Create a module that takes the outputs from the WRITE, COMPRESS, and ISOLATE pillars to build the final, context-rich prompt.

master.title: Create Main Orchestration Script
master.description: Develop the main script that orchestrates the pipeline, calling each pillar in sequence and printing the final generated prompt.
